## Type of change
- Bugfix
- New feature

## Checklist
- [ ] I ran the test suite: `pytest -q tests`
- [ ] I updated relevant documentation (`.github/copilot-instructions.md`, `README.md`, or `CONTRIBUTING.md`) if needed
- [ ] Changes are small and focused (prefer 1 feature/fix per PR)
- [ ] Public API preserved or version bump explained

## How to test
Provide short instructions to reproduce the behavior or run the new tests.
